#commander #leader_trait_adaptable_2 
xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_commander_leader_trait_adaptable_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = { always = yes }
    allow = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_points_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_picked_class_commander_trigger = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_count_points_costs_effect = yes }
    }
}

        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_picked_class_commander_trigger = yes

        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_picked_class_commander_trigger = yes
        has_ancrel = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_archaeo_specialization_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_count_points_costs_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}

    potential = { always = yes }
    allow = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_artillery_specialization_3 }
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_requires_leader_subclass_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_admiral }
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_picked_class_commander_trigger = yes
        has_technology = tech_destroyers
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_artillery_specialization_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_count_points_costs_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}

    potential = { always = yes }
    allow = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_carrier_specialization_3 }
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_requires_leader_subclass_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_admiral }
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_picked_class_commander_trigger = yes
        has_technology = tech_cruisers
        has_technology = tech_strike_craft_1
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_carrier_specialization_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_count_points_costs_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}

    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_space_miner_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_count_points_costs_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}


#commander #leader_trait_surgical_bombardment_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_commander_leader_trait_surgical_bombardment_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = { always = yes }
    allow = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_surgical_bombardment_3 }
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_requires_leader_subclass_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_general }
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_picked_class_commander_trigger = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_surgical_bombardment_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_count_points_costs_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}
